summary: Get, add, and update data in Snowflake.

parameters.name: operation
parameters.description: The operation to perform in Snowflake (Execute Query, Insert, Update).

parameters.name: table
parameters.description: Name of the table in which to insert or update data.

parameters.name: columns
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of properties to use as columns for new rows (Insert) or rows to update (Update).

parameters.name: update key
parameters.description: Name of the property that decides which rows in the database should be updated (e.g., 'id').
